short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Repository Tracker allows you to track issues and pull requests in your favorite GitHub repositories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Repository Tracker lets you add GitHub repositories, and displays repository information on issues and pull requests in the past 24 hours. A badge shows the total number of events. Repository Tracker also displays popup notifications when someone creates a new issue or pull request in one of the repositories that you track. You can disable this feature on the application's Options page. The Options page also allows you to enter your own GitHub API key. We recommend doing this because GitHub allows users more requests to their API when using a key, and also this lets you track your own private repositories.
